Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Watcher^reset; to the ^green;purple-armored scientist^reset; at the top floor of the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Powered stations are a ^orange;huge productivity booster^white;. With a ^orange;Watcher^reset; they are even more versatile! Try crafting a ^orange;watcher^reset; in your ^green;Power Station^reset; and bring it to me.

Watchers are special. They will keep powered devices within their range ^gray;(20 blocks)^reset; running while you are away, planetside. Leaving a planet will ^orange;reset all of your watchers^reset;. ^red;Don't overuse them!^reset; Your SAIL can only track so many before it slows down.
